properties.name: Stoelt Productions, LLC
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 6464 W. Sunset Blvd, Suite 830, Los Angeles, CA 90028Stoelt Productions was formed in October 2003 to put an end to the disparity between concept and execution. Catering to the hottest brands, we have direct access to control the customization and fabrication of media, presence and branding elements. Driven by our passion for perfection, we handpick each project to ensure flawless execution and a direct approach to every venture on our roster. From the smallest detail to the seemingly unreachable idea, we make it happen from concept to execution. Our work ranges from high profile Fashion Week events to store window design and installations to art direction and consulting. We are simply the one-stop 24/7 on-call creative shop for all our client’s branding and marketing needs.
